content: It's great to hear that Saina Nehwal was interested in the Helios product and even signed it as an autograph in the video. Her endorsement could help bring more attention to the product and increase its popularity among badminton players and other athletes. With a growing number of athletes and coaches looking for innovative training solutions, the sports tech industry is becoming increasingly important in the world of sports, and products like Helios could help athletes take their training to the next level.
